relation: Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
BE AWARE OF ALL YOUR SURROUNDINGS
CAMPUS ACTIVITIES BOARD LA CRUIZERS CAR CLUB CAT DRAGGERZ CAR CLUB
I DON'T HAVE ANY AT THE MOMENT.
WATCH YOUR SPENDING AND COLLECT ALOT OF COUPONS
GO TO THE PARK WITH MY SON.
I EAT OUT SOMETIMES EITHER ON THE WAY TO SCHOOL OR ON THE WAY HOME. I WILL JUST GET ME SOMETHING TO HOLD ME OVER TILL I GET HOME TO COOK SUPPER FOR ME AND MY SON.
I HAVE NOT PERSONALLY LIVED ON CAMPUS SO I CANNOT SHARE ANY EXPERIENCE WITH U ON THAT SUBJECT.
I AM HIGHLY DEVOTED IN GETTING MY BACHELOR IN NURSING FOR A LONG TIME.

FIRST MAKE SURE U R TAKING ALL YOUR CLASSES IN A SMALL COMMUNITY COLLEGE THAT WILL TRANSFER OVER TO YOUR FOUR YEAR COLLEGE. YOU WILL HAVE SAVED ALOT OF TIME WASTED AND ALOT ON YOUR FINANCIAL AID MONEY AS WELL.

I WOULD RATE ROANE STATE COMMUNITY COLLEGE TO BE A GREAT COLLEGE TO START OUT WITH, IF YOUR STARTING IN THE NURSING FIELD. IT WILL HELP CUT COSTS WHEN U DECIDE TO TRANSFER COLLEGES TO A FOUR YEAR COLLEGE. I WOULD RECOMMEND ANYONE TO START THEIR CAREER FIELD AT ROANE STATE COMMUNITY COLLEGE ANYTIME. THANK U AND GOD BLESS EACH AND EVERYONE OF YOU.

textAfterTable: Great for these types of students Nursing is a very popular major at Roane State. Tips for prospective students Be organized. You're not in high school anymore, professors don't like excuses. If you wait until the last minute on your class work it will show. This goes for every college not just Roane State. Bang for the buck It's a community college so that automatically makes it cheaper than a four year university. However you are getting just as much or even more education than if you did go to a four year school. Am learning a lot Because it is a smaller school you are able to actually talk to the professors if you have a question, and not just be one of over 100 students in one class. Login to rate or flag the reviews Kerry from Jacksboro, TN 01/29/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 4 of 43
